subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: In his first tournament in more than 100 days, Tiger Woods missed the 36-hole cut by four strokes after “a ton of little, simple mistakes” at the Quicken Loans International in Bethesda, Md.
snippet: In his first tournament in more than 100 days, Tiger Woods missed the 36-hole cut by four strokes after “a ton of little, simple mistakes” at the Quicken Loans International in Bethesda, Md.
